Name: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss - Episode 1
About the game: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss is a mature, four-part, gritty interactive drama series, shrouded in crime, secrets and the supernatural. A proper adaptation to werewolf fiction, with deep character development. Play as John, a career criminal with a reprehensible past. Upon waking in an unknown hotel, bloodied, injured and having no memory of the last eight years, he struggles to make sense of his own disappearance. Tormenting nightmares and chronic pain overwhelms him, leading him down a path of insanity. Designed for the casual gamer. Story and cinematic scene heavy, with dialogue choices. No puzzles. No side-quests. Good vibes. Great voice acting. Combat increases in difficulty and complexity as the game progresses. This build only includes: EPISODE 1
